item.title: 40cm ish across and deep, 2nd December
item.description:
There is a large pothole on Leckhampton hill near to the entrance to Hartley Lane. It is on the left hand side of the rd when you are going down the Hill and it is quite big.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned traffic cones, 2nd December
item.description:
Earlier this month I reported that on A436 between Pegglesworth and Kilkenny there are a whole lot of damaged and/or abandoned traffic cones in the verges (enquiry 22089769) that have been there for many months. Subsequently you closed the report. But there remain at least 13 cones still in the verge grass along this stretch of highway serving no useful purpose. I ask again if we could get them removed please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: TMC - Defects -other CW6 problem, 2nd December
item.description:
Stats Required CW Rutting & Depressions 1500 x 1500 x 62mm Road Closure (CW6 Rutting&Depressions)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 2nd December
item.description:
2 Emails received 01/12/2025 - copies attached. Customer queries why traffic hasn’t been diverted via Typhoon way then left (not via the school) then back onto the main drag Stearman Walk? The road could of been closed then for the work to continue. Traffic can flow then, without the need for lights. Also why can’t they close it to non residents and use Hucclecote Road as they used to prior to Coopers Edge being opened?
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
